Articles.Content:
Hello there!

I'd like to share an adventure with you. An adventure that's out of this world!

With my new Space Sausage i'm going to fly to the moon and back with a crew of three. But this is not your ordinary quickly slapped together spacecraft!

The Space Sausage has a rather funky transfer stage that is very compact but oh, so powerful

Have a look and tell me what you think: http://steamcommunity.com/id/jona623e/screenshots/?appid=220200

You can of course check out all my other crazy tests and adventures in my screenshot section

~Yondas (DK)
